gen_hrf_lagged

Source: R/hrf.R
gen_hrf_lagged.Rd

gen_hrf_lagged

gen_hrf_lagged(hrf, lag = 2, ...)

Arguments

hrf

the underlying hrf function to shift
lag

the lag/delay in seconds
...

extra args supplied to hrf function

Examples

hrf_lag5 <- gen_hrf_lagged(HRF_SPMG1, lag=5)
hrf_lag5(0:20)

#>  [1]  0.0000000000  0.0000000000  0.0000000000  0.0000000000  0.0000000000
#>  [6]  0.0000000000  0.0030644357  0.0360749725  0.1007783949  0.1562284280
#> [11]  0.1753709753  0.1604103492  0.1271138114  0.0900626906  0.0574641449

#> [21] -0.0151376268
